Logo didn't authorize me to have her chars switch sides, JP, so 
you're going to have to wait a bit for her to get back if Darkmouse 
is to go peacefully.

::Darkmouse::

Darkmouse sighs, listening to the message playing over her comm-link. 
What did these bots want? She was accepted on the team that she was 
on, and she wasn't going to betray. It was KitKat's old team. She 
wanted to honor her old friend's memory.

"DrillBit," she says into the comm, sending the transmission to 
DrillBit, "Some bots just contacted me. They say they want me to join 
them because I have energon blood. Can you please take care of them?"

She enters the mess hall and sits down at a table, sighing and 
relaxing in her seat.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, JP3884@a... wrote:
>        Ominous Prime looked across the vastness of the Greek isles. 
It had to 
> admit it was a beautiful place, one that would serve as an 
important location 
> in the future. The volcano, containing Darkfates base, loomed in 
the distance.
>        "Shes in there. We will have her. You failed the first time, 
fail 
> agian and I shall make you suffer." Ominous said coldly to his 
troops behinde 
> him. The new addition of Quasar was with them. She had finally been 
broken, 
> just as Darkmouse would be.
>        "Commander we will not fail. Lets send a transmission. I 
doubt we 
> could enter there base anyways." Putnam suggested, handing a Comm 
unit to 
> Ominous.
>        He took it, held it to his mouth and said, "Darkmouse, 
energon flows 
> through your veins. You belong with the Energonians. Join us, our 
superior 
> race, and relish in the glory of victory that will be ours!" He 
paused, face 
> darkened. "If you do decline this offer, however, we will have to 
take you by 
> force. And I do promise you that we will not fail agian."
